channel.title: I need help with max hit
channel.description: well, you can hit fine when your using the attack option but when you put it down to str you cant hit the max is like 10 with d scim at 80+ str and idk how to change it to hit higher, can anyone help?

item.title: I need help with max hit
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

There are 4 boxes on runescape, Attack Styles The First being attack and last one being defence hit the hardest, While the other 2 in the middle hit really soft.

To be able to change this, search this in client.java

The Method:

CalculateMaxHit() {

As you can see thats why it hits hard:

if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { //Accurate & Defensive

I think the closer it is to 1 it hits harder, i could be wrong though, because i don’t remember at the moment.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with max hit
